text: Jisas takaw olap agak, Bɨ ogɨnap kɨli apal, Chɨn bɨ God gos ñek agñeb mɨdobun apal ak pen, yepɨs apal agak. Nɨbi pen gos nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb, bɨ anɨb okok takaw kɨlop ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Chen ladek tek mɨdebal agak. Kɨli chag sipsip sayn tep tek sɨlok lɨl opal ak pen, chen ladek su lup tek ak nɨbop gɨnɨg opal agak.
